name: Ras n’Ouanoukrim (4083 m) / Timzguida Ouest (4089 m)
overview: An exhilarating adventure to North Africa's highest peak.

details: Departure from Imlil.
Lunch near Chamharouch.
Arrival at the Toubkal Base Camp.
Dinner and shower.
Early breakfast at 4:00 AM.
Summit push at 5:00 AM.
Lunch back at the base camp.
Return to Imlil.
Option to stay overnight in Imlil or head back.

cost_includes: Accommodation in mountain refuges and lodges

name: Toubkal (4167m) / Toubkal Ouest (4030 m) / Imouzzer - Tibherine (4010 m)
overview: An exhilarating adventure to North Africa's highest peak.

details: Departure from Imlil.
Lunch near Chamharouch.
Arrival at the Toubkal Base Camp.
Dinner and shower.
Early breakfast at 4:00 AM.
Summit push at 5:00 AM.
Lunch back at the base camp.
Return to Imlil.
Option to stay overnight in Imlil or head back.

cost_includes: Accommodation in mountain refuges and lodges

name: Ighil M’Goun (4071 m)
overview: An exhilarating adventure to North Africa's highest peak.

details: Morning: Arrival in Azilal, a popular starting point for the ascent.
Noon: Arrival at the starting point of the trek, either the village of Ijoukak or Ait Bouguemez (depending on the itinerary chosen).
Afternoon: Meet your local guide (mandatory for treks in this area) and prepare for the trek.
Evening: Settle in a guesthouse or camp in the valley, enjoy a traditional dinner.
Morning: Breakfast, then departure for the first day of trekking. The route begins with a hike through the M'goun Valley, offering stunning views of mountains and Berber villages.
Noon: Lunch break along the way, picnic prepared by your team.
Afternoon: Arrival at the Tamsoult Refuge or camp. This place offers a good base for the M'goun ascent. Dinner and overnight stay at the refuge or in tents.
Very early morning: Light breakfast. Early departure for the summit ascent.
Route: The ascent starts with a gradual climb through rocky terrain and grassy slopes. Reaching the summit of M'goun can take between 5 to 7 hours, depending on the fitness level of the group.
Summit arrival: Once at the top, enjoy the breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains, valleys, and other peaks of the High Atlas.
Morning: Breakfast, then departure for the descent to the valley.
Route: The trek descends through the Ijoukak or Ait Bouguemez valley, passing through stunning landscapes of mountains, streams, and Berber villages.
Noon: Lunch break along the way.
Afternoon: Arrival in the valley, then transfer by vehicle back to Azilal.
Evening: Return to Azilal, end of the ascent.

cost_includes: Accommodation in mountain refuges and lodges

name: Afella (4044m) Kesh
overview: A climb to Afella's peak for seasoned trekkers seeking adventure.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Marrakech.
Day 2: Trek to Afella Base Camp.
Day 3: Summit Afella and return to camp.
Day 4: Explore nearby valleys.
Day 5: Return to Marrakech.

name: Biquinoussen (4002) Kesh
overview: A trek to Biquinoussen offering beautiful trails and serene landscapes.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Marrakech and transfer to the trailhead.
Day 2: Trek to Biquinoussen Base Camp.
Day 3: Summit Biquinoussen (4002m) and return to camp.
Day 4: Descend and transfer back to Marrakech.
cost_includes: Accommodation in local lodges or camps

name: Iferouane (4001m) Kesh
overview: A peaceful and picturesque trek to the Iferouane summit.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Marrakech and drive to Imlil.
Day 2: Trek to Iferouane Base Camp.
Day 3: Summit Iferouane (4001m) and enjoy panoramic views.
Day 4: Explore the surrounding valleys and return to camp.
Day 5: Descend to Imlil and transfer back to Marrakech.

name: Mgoun (4071m)
overview: A challenging trek to Mgoun, Morocco's second-highest peak.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Marrakech and transfer to Ait Bouguemez.
Day 2: Trek through Ait Bouguemez Valley.
Day 3: Acclimatization and cultural exploration.
Day 4: Reach Mgoun Base Camp.
Day 5: Summit Mgoun (4071m).
Day 6: Descend through valleys.
Day 7: Return to Ait Bouguemez.
Day 8: Transfer back to Marrakech.
